name: Mechatroniks Attack
description: Mechatroniks Attack is an amateur very difficult action game. Try the Demo version to check if you like it and if your computer work with it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: HD Realtek
